title: Canada
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 294 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 550L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and X
description: As the second-largest country in the world, Canada has much to explore. Students will enjoy learning about everything from the nation's capital to its native wildlife.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
